text:
Tang Xue Mei (born 4 February 1994) is a Chinese female sitting volleyball player. She is part of the China women's national sitting volleyball team. She competed at the 2010 Asian Para Games, 2012 Summer Paralympics winning the gold medal, 2018 Asian Para Games, and 2018 World ParaVolley World Championships.
She was injured in the 2008 Sichuan earthquake.

annotations.surface_form: China women's national sitting volleyball team
